meanings.definition: Consisting of three letters or characters.
meanings.sent1: The trigraphic code was easy to decipher.

meanings.sent3: The trigraphic puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her trigraphic handwriting was as neat as a printed page.
meanings.sent5: The trigraphic symbol stood out among the others.
